title: Ep 158: Air Fryers, Leaf Blowers and 100 Uses For Baby Powder
itunes:title: Ep 158: Air Fryers, Leaf Blowers and 100 Uses For Baby Powder
itunes:subtitle: Plus Hannah joins us for The Dresser Report
description:
Two products I bought in the last 60 days that have been worth it: an air fryer and a leaf blower. Sally has neither but maybe by the end of the show has both? And why I think an air fryer has much more staying power than the Instant Pot.

 

Plus Hannah, who took home the vintage dresser I couldn’t stop thinking about, joins us to give an update on how it’s doing in her home. Then she stuns us with a baby powder lifehack that leaves Sally and I gasping.

 

Mentioned on the show:

  • Air Fryer: https://amzn.to/3F2jmj7 
  • Leaf Blower: https://howl.me/cikY6WBrzzU 
  • The Dresser Episode: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ep-155-i-wish-you-would-step-back-from-that-dresser-my-friend/id1488696878?i=1000581253922 
  • The Dresser ITSELF: https://www.pinterest.com/pin/ASCEXrjS1jDcFBQnE5DeDY4OyEz4qhoxx1vrypmLmP6NuMA4D_ZZXfo/
